1.title: The Costumes of Cinderella
1.plot: This week, The coach - Meredith Placko - alongside special guest host Anastasia Washginton break down the magical costumes of Disney's latest live action feature - Cinderella!

2.title: Costumes from Game of Thrones
2.plot: Today on The Cosplay Coach, Meredith Placko is tackling the costumes of Game Of Thrones! Winter Is Coming! Will you be prepared?!

3.title: The Costumes of Hook
3.plot: Emma Fyfe joins Cosplay Coach Meredith Placko to breakdown the costumes of Hook!

4.title: The Costumes from Avengers 2: Age of Ultron
4.plot: How do you outfit the world's greatest super hero team? Meredith Placko, Emma Fyffe and special guest Katie Elhoffer take a look inside the Avengers closets this week! Learn how to make some of the most iconic pieces from Captain America's shield to Black Widow's signature bodysuit. We break it all down in this episode of Cosplay Coach!

5.title: The Interstellar Costumes of the Fifth Element
5.plot: Jean Paul Gaultier is known for pushing the boundaries of fashion, so it's no wonder when Luc Besson was looking for a designer for his space opera The Fifth Element, he brought on L'Enfant Terrible himself to create the looks for Korben, Leeloo and their motley crew. Today on Cosplay Coach, we'll show you what goes into creating some of the coolest outfits in space.

6.title: Fashion in the Apocalypse with Mad Max
6.plot: Get your football pads ready and gear up for this week's Cosplay Coach! We're getting mad in here - not angry, but crazy with Mad Max Fury Road coming out this week. We talk the costumes from George Miller's post apocalyptic rock opera and how you can gear up for the end of the world. Guest Andrew Fogel (League of Steam) joins us to talk shop and cars!

7.title: Pride and Prejudice Costume Designs
7.plot: Emma, Alana, and special guests Yume and Michelle host The Cosplay Coach this week! Bust out your parasol for this week's Cosplay Coach! We're taking a stroll down memory lane. We talk the costumes from Pride & Prejudice. Guests Yume and Michelle join us to break it all down!

8.title: Behind the Mask of Batman
8.plot: The Caped Crusader has undergone many transformations throughout the years; join hosts Meredith Placko, Emma Fyffe, Alana Jordan and guest, Jeff Henderson as they dissect the bat on this week's Batman-themed episode of Cosplay Coach!

9.title: The Girls of DC Comics
9.plot: It's a love letter to the ladies and their costumes of DC Comics!

10.title: Costumes of the New Disney Princesses
10.plot: This week the crew takes a look at the new wave of Disney Princesses with costume designer Kristen Carr.

11.title: Superheroes and Spandex
11.plot: First introduced in the 1950s, Spandex is a great fabric for swimsuits and superhero costumes! The team shows you some of the best ways to work with spandex and what commercial patterns are available to get you started to creating your own secret identity!

12.title: The Post San Diego Comic Con Show!
12.plot: The girls are back from San Diego Comic Con and they wrap the season up with the best costumes they saw that the show! See you next season!

locations: Los Angeles, California, USA::(studio) (AfterBuzz Television Studios)
imdb.title: Cosplay Coach
